```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
house_gop_joint <- read_csv("house_gop_joint.csv")
```

```{r}
house_gop_joint_wide <- house_gop_joint |> pivot_wider(names_from = fecid, values_from = rank)

all_three <- house_gop_joint_wide |> filter(!is.na(Emmer), !is.na(Scalise), !is.na(Johnson))

```


```{r}
write_csv(house_gop_joint_wide, "house_gop_joint_wide.csv")

write_csv(all_three, "all_three.csv")
```
